fields.label: Alternatives - first alternative is the correct one.

semantics.label: 全体のフィードバック

fields.label: ある得点範囲に対して、カスタムフィードバックを定義します。
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: 定義した得点範囲に対するフィードバック
fields.placeholder: フィードバックを記入

fields.label: Auto continue
fields.description: Automatically go to next question when alternative is selected. This needs to be turned off to make the content fully accessible when using a screen reader.

fields.label: 合格パーセンテージ
fields.description: クイズにパスするために必要となる合計点のパーセンテージです。

fields.label: Title for the show solution view
正解のためのリードスピーカー用テキスト
不正解ためのリードスピーカー用テキスト
Option should not have been selected
Label for the "mute" button, to disable feedback sound
Slide number text
fields.description: Announces current slide and total number of slides, variables are :num and :total

fields.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Label for the question number in the solution list
fields.description: Announces current question index in solution list, variables are :num

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
